website_summaries.verdict: A good cross-section of oil blends for use with a variety of ailments, but not the best choice for those looking to experiment with creating their own unique blends.
pros: Set consists of six 10 milliliter bottles
Unique scent blends include Good Sleep, Stress Relief, and Health Shield
Great for those who suffer from insomnia and various ailments
A few drops go a long way
cons: Some issues with bottles that leaked during shipping
Some buyers also report problems with rashes developing, so you may wish to avoid skin contact

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful blends
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this assortment. I was hesitant because the description didn't list what oils were in each blend, but they are wonderful. Head ease- French Lavender, Peppermint, Wintergreen, Basil, Frankincense, Rosemary, Sweet Marjoram, Sweet Orange. Breath- Peppermint, Rosemary, Lemon, Eucalyptus. Deep Muscle- Wintergreen, Peppermint, Chamomile, Eucalyptus, Camphor. Health Shield- Cinnamon, Clove, Eucalyptus, Lemon, Rosemary. Stress Relief- Bergamot, Patchouli, Blood Orange, Ylang Ylang, Grapefruit. Good Night- Chamomile, Clary Sage, Copaiba, Lavender, Peru Balsam, Sandalwood, Sweet Marjoram, Ylang Ylang.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Piers

customer_reviews.title: Where's the quality control?
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed to have discovered what seems to be a complete lack of quality control with these oils. I've had different set of blends by Healing Solutions and loved them. I thought it made sense to expand my collection to try their other wonderful-sounding scents. Unfortunately, I found that my favorites from previous sets smelled nothing like what I'm used to - they went from something really enjoyable to something totally unpleasant. Several of the new oils I was excited to try had an overpowering lemongrass or citronella smell - so much so that they were completely unpleasant and smelled identically bad. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: The strength is not there and it doesn't say what is blended in the mix like other reputable sellers
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely cut with some type of oil, it is not as strong and I need to use the whole bottle in a diffuser to be able to smell anything. I have used doterra, young living, aura cacia, and a few others and never had this issue. It leaves a residue on your diffuser so it is impossible to not be cut with the oil residue it leaves behind. The strength is not there and it doesn't say what is blended in the mix like other reputable sellers. I would not recommend this to anyone!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Mawhorter

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value
customer_reviews.text: Kit contained 6 different essential oil combinations. Bottles were all full. Packaging was good. *Good Night---Lavender seems to be the predominant odor in this mixture. *Stress Relief--Smells familiar, like the air at the peak of Spring when everything is in bloom. *Health Shield--Has a sweet cinnamon smell that reminds me of cinnamon chewing gum. *Deep Muscle--Reminds me of the smell of over-the-counter muscle rubs. More for medicinal use than aroma therapy. I would add a few drops to an Epsom salt bath or foot soak. *Breathe--smells like eucalyptus. *Headache--This has a warm, minty smell.
customer_reviews.author: NJMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because Im new to the diffusing oil world and wanted to try a couple. Ive been using the Health Sheild, Breathe and Good Sleep in my son's (3 year old) room. He was waking up with nightmares and also gets asthma like symptoms when he has a cold. Since using these he hasnt woken from a dream. Ive noticed he wakes in a better mood. I alao started to use the stress relief for myself and have fallen asleep quicker and had better nights sleep! The packaging wasnt an issue for me. Everything came sealed and unbroken. So far we're in love with them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell good
customer_reviews.text: These smell terrible. Not worth the money even on a lighting deal. I love essential oils but there is something about these blends that just isn't right. The only one I can stand is the breath right but only a few drops in a huge pot of water
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Chabot

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac vs Chevy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Oil has great fragrance. I use for distilling, and have purchased 2 of the blended type and another 1 of single oils. I read reviews of several types before purchase and this type, and price, in my opinion, was the the best. I would buy again. This oil is not edible, like 'Young Living', but for distilling it works perfectly, and the price point is hugely different. I know we'd all like to own cadillacs, but often we must choose a well done Chevy instead. 😁 And sometimes the Chevy works as well, or better, then the caddy.
customer_reviews.author: judyrice47

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning these today and I just got them. I love essential oils and thought this would be fun to try, but I made a mistake. Two of the bottles both have the same single ingredient-pelargonium graveolens oil -but are called different blends-and I can't stand the smell. The entire box smells exactly like icy hot but worse. I'll stick to making my own mixes-with real oils.
customer_reviews.author: mother of 4

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because I wanted the Breathe, Muscle, and headache blend. It was cheaper to buy the set instead of individuals. I got the breathe because I have severe sleep apnea And every night i have to use a nose spray to clear my sinus so i can breathe thru my Vpap machine. I have been using Breathe for a week and it has been working I don’t need to use the nose spray. I was told nose spray can damage the nose inner wall. I would recommend these oils. I just started using the Muscle blend.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Therapeutic but Horrible smelling
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if these actually help anything, because I can't get past the horrible smell. Each one I try smells worse than the previous one. I guess I need a different type of therapy that smells better. These smells make me angry that I wasted my money. I'm sorry my return window has closed on this item
customer_reviews.author: GypsyI

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: All the scents ranged from gross to just okay. The just okay ones I used did not last long at all in my diffuser. I’ve used lots of different oils in it and the scents usually last for hours but these would start off with a scent but within a few mins of the diffuser running I could only smell them if I was standing right over the diffuser. I tried adding many more drops than I have in the past but that didn’t make a difference. I don’t understand how there are so many good reviews of these oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Im not team DoTerra or team Young living -I’m not an oil snob. However, this oil smells gross. I ordered a set from this brand & each one had the same unpleasant scent. Returning! I did order Plant Therapy EO from Amazon & have been happy with them. I am happy with every brand I’ve tried except this one. *PMS BLEND review & set review of 6 oils.
customer_reviews.author: MomSays

customer_reviews.title: Bottle completely gone because leaked and stinks
customer_reviews.text: I just received the oils and one of the bottles was completely gone because the cap was not closed. So when I opened the package, all the other items that were shipped with this, smelled of cloves. If you have ever touched or dealt with cloves, you know these are very potent~ I have it all over my hands, all over the house....it was NOT good. So on top of not having one of the bottles because it is gone, I have to smell it much more than I would have liked! It is so strong, the household had to go outside!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie K.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong oils!!!!!!! Not the same blends listed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous! I’ve ordered this twice both times not blends listed in the description!!!!! I’m beyond frustratedd! And just want the 14 oils in the description!!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. The head ease does help with my migraines
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. The head ease does help with my migraines. The muscle ease does seem to help with my neck muscles. The anxiety one, is okay, but doesn't work as well as other ones I've tried such as Chill Pill & Panic Button. Problem the only place I know of that sells those two is about 450miles away & they don't ship. :( Haven't used the other ones yet, but plan on using them in some home made soaps & stuff. Also, these don't seem to last very long, compared to other oils I've used over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Kadan0073

customer_reviews.title: Use every night before I go to sleep! And in the office!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this essential oils set! I’ve been getting absolutely AMAZINGLY good sleep lately and I realized it started ever since I started using these before I go to bed, and putting them on my pillow! I use the “stress relief” and/or “good sleep” every night and I swear I have never slept this good. I also brought a few to work with me and keep them at my desk - relieves stress and smells amazing! My coworkers can’t stop asking me to use them. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RETZ101

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to try new things
customer_reviews.text: It's a great way to smell all of the oils and test them out. My favorite was breathe but the bottle was half empty I'm guessing since it kinda leaked out of the box. I wish there was a stronger eucalyptus smell to one of them but breathe came as close to that. The reason why it lost a two stars is cause they spilled out and I wanted a stronger eucalyptus smell. Update: this company is awesome after my First review they reached out to me and see if there was anything they can do to make things better. They followed though with everything and made sure I was happy with my purchase! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rosa hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: I had these oils in my shopping cart for week, I researched this brand and read all the reviews. I finally decided to purchase them! One bottle arrived cracked and leaking but the rest were in great shape. The smell and blends of these oils was very disappointing they all smelled very chemically and when defused they had no scent at all and the ones that had a hint of a scent didn't last at all. Maybe I received a bad batch, but all in all very disappointed especially for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recieved used box with half empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a box of apparently used oils. The labels were worn and rubbed off. One bottle was half empty. Sadly it was my favorite of the batch that was half empty.. The stress relief which was the reason I was buying the oils was half empty. Luckily I wasnt gifting this set!!! I have bought these before and they were new and smelled divine. I also gifted some to my friend who didn't mention hers coming in poor condition. Beware this happens when considering gifting them. They were sent by Prime Time Commerce.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Mare

customer_reviews.title: Great smells, kooky vibes, low price.
customer_reviews.text: Mmmmmmm, can you smell it? That's peace. That's tranquility. That's absolution. K, I have no idea what that last word means but essential oils smell amazing and will bring out the kook in anyone. I bought these the cheap Urpower diffuser and I run them every day. They all smell good. I have no idea if they invoke the claimed effects but it doesn't matter. They smell so good! Placebo or not, you know i'm rubbin that Stress Relief straight on my temples when I'm feeling stressed.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm shopping for the best essential oils for the money & potency. These are not it. Three of the oils leaked out into the box making all the labels a mess. Thank goodness I have experience with oils & food, herbs & tree scents. None of the oils were pure, meaning they're all diluted with other oils so they can't be used in foods or drinks as some like to for well being. This isn't labeled on the box either which can be dangerous. Sorry I cannot endorse the efforts of this company as a serious herbalist.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to ordering these (as they have been in my cart for months) and I finally got around too it, and I am disappointed. The scents that I received do not smell like the pure essential oils that are sold by the more expensive brands. The one that I was most looking forward to was the health shield (especially after reading it smells like thieves), and again, disappointed. I was so looking forward to these and really wanted to like them, but I am having hard time with that.
customer_reviews.author: Caelon

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't trust them!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT TRUE ESSENTIAL OILS AS WRITTEN IN THE DESCRIPTION! I should have know that you get what you pay for! I did the drop test, and both the Health Shield blend and the Breathe Blend leave residue on clean white paper. They also do not have the scientific names of the plants listed on the packaging, which further leads me to believe they are not pure essential oils. They smell fine, so I'm sure they would be all right if you want to use them in a diffuser, but not for medicinal/topical purposes. I am returning them today.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of oil blends, great smell
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I already owned Health shield, but this set was just excellent. All 6 blends smell really nice (I diffuse them), very balanced, not too overpowering. Zero headaches. Package arrived in perfect conditions, no leakages. I strongly recommend it. A brief attempt at describing the scents: - Health Shield: smells like spices, has an autumn vibe - Stress relief and Head ease: very similar, very sutil blends, no distinctive smell but overall pleasing - Deep muscle: camphor smell but not overpowering; my favorite! - Breathe blend: eucalyptus and rosemary in a softer blend - Good night: mostly lavender, also very soothing
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I’ve sprung a leak all over your gift!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could tell you about the actual product, but I can’t. It arrived and one or more bottles had leaked ruining all the labels in the box affected. I sent it back and requested a replacement. The replacement arrived and both boxes were ruined by leaks. So, I guess I’ll never know. But I’m disappointed by this as this was supposed to be a gift for someone and now I have to start over.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love the oils - the sleep blend works great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the oils - the sleep blend works great for me! I haven't tried a couple of them, but don't like the smell of the "stress" blend. What I really don't like is that the oil comes quickly out of the bottle. I guess my bottles were damaged during shipping, so they had leaked out. I don't hold this against the manufacturer, but think the quality of the bottles is poor. That being said, the set is a great value and is perfect for a beginner to essential oils like myself! Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: kymom2020

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble finding my previous brand of oils (Ellia) and after searching and reviews, stumbled on this. Scents are excellent; I regularly use the Breathe and Health in my diffuser at bedtime to help with allergies. Ingredients are similar to my previous oils, and price is better (thru Amazon - I checked their website). Thank you for carrying this brand!
customer_reviews.author: JulieSTL

customer_reviews.title: They're good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These do the job but they aren't as pleasant as fresh essential oils from the farmer's market. Still, for the price, worth it. I'm not sure if it's an allergy, one of the oils made me cough a lot when it was in my diffuser. So I gave that one to a friend, with a warning that it might burn her throat. Another had clove in it and clove and I have a well known hate hate relationship so my friend got that one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katuna

customer_reviews.title: Great product, packaging and supply -ehh.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, quality and aroma of oils are great. Downside is in the packaging. First order arrived with the health shield emptied through leakage. The entire package was covered in the oil. The replacement package arrived with 2 breath oils and no health shield. One of the reasons I ordered the multi pack was to get the health shield. Disappointed, but don’t feel like returning or exchanging a third time. I just went ahead and purchased an individual health shield that arrived a-ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They all arrived broken and leaking oil everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in these. Every single bottle was already opened and oil and leaked into package. The labels themselves had slid off due to the oils. Do not recommend buying these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Scent is very minimal. Not a good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: melissa j czubat

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: It's not the quality product, I love the oils for sure. I'm just extremely disappointed with the poor packaging. 3 bottles leaked because the caps, even though the safety seal was in tact, seemed to have not been screwed on correctly and now I have less than half liquid in 3 the 6 bottles. These oils were shipped in the same package with 2 other items I'd ordered, leaked thru both boxes and actually ruined a set of disposable dishes, which are kinda useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Mekia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Blends for All Kinds of Uses
customer_reviews.text: I read multiple reviews on Amazon before I bought this set. I, like other people in the reviews, have used essential oils from other creators in the past. I read the suggestions in the reviews and tried out some of their ideas. I agree with other reviewers. The Deep Muscle blend helped my shoulders and feet. I also used the Health Shield blend in a diffuser and liked how long it lasted. I have used essential oils where they disappeared very quickly and I had to add more. I got this set as a daily deal, so it helped motivate my purchase. I am very happy with these oils and will purchase them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 out of 6 bottles smell nice!
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 (Head and Stress Relief) out of the 6 bottles smells pleasant. The others were difficult to bear, with one smelling like a typical dentist office!! Only bought this item because of its high reviews. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Like.No.Other

customer_reviews.title: I specifically bought it for the good night sleep and the breathe but the good night ...
customer_reviews.text: not crazy about this assortment. I specifically bought it for the good night sleep and the breathe but the good night sleep makes me have the strangest dreams. I’ve used it on and off and everytime I go to sleep using that oil I have crazy dreams that make it seem like I’m not even resting. The breathe oil was nice, and the rest were too strong. Kinda annoying we can’t read the oils that are in each of them. I’ll be returning and probably just buying the breathe oil separately.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cook

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing to have a label completely missing from a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: One bottle arrived unlabeled. I checked inside the box and it wasn't in there either. By process of elimination I was able to determine it is the Breathe Blend. Usually I really like these blends and find them to be there very therapeutic. Disappointing to have a label completely missing from a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: This will be the last time I order from Healing Solutions because again I have received a 6 pack of essential oils with a 2 jars that were leaking. I was always pleased with this company until recently; the quality control is not good anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eljay

customer_reviews.title: All 28 smell EXACTLY THE SAME and horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. I purchased the set of 28 and they are horrible. HORRIBLE quality. 23 out of the 28 smell exactly the same, and the scent is horrendous. They’re potency isn’t enough to fill a very small bedroom, even with my nose expensive diffuser. I have only felt inclined to write reviews on products I really love. I usually let it go when I’m not a particular fan of something. This is the first time I am taking my time to leave a negative review. I don’t want anyone to feel as let down as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not Organic!
customer_reviews.text: I could not figure out how to contact the seller..... these are marketed as organic. But, they are not! They still smell great. But, from reading other reviews folks recommended that I check to see if they say organic on them. And the last 2 boxes I’ve received are not labeled organic! Hopefully someone can help me find a way to contact the seller in regards to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Scented  blends
customer_reviews.text: These blends all have a nice scent. Especially the one for sleep, I was out like a light. With a pandemic going on, these essential oils have really helped with my sleeping and anxiety. My first order came with one of the bottles broken but Amazon promptly resent me a new box the next day. I would definitely recommend this brand to anyone who uses essential oil’s.
customer_reviews.author: fossil girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix
customer_reviews.text: I got this assortment initially because I needed a replacement of the "good sleep" blend for my diffuser but I wanted to try some other oils from this company. I like most of the smells from each blend, but I do actually feel like some I have tried do what they claim. I have been using the muscle ache oil mixed with lotion on sore muscles and it really provides relief. The breathe blend has helped during a cold as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak smell
customer_reviews.text: The blends in this set are really weak. It seems that they are diluted in some way (the bottle says they are not, but their smell is fairly weak, so they must be). Also, note that the formula of some of these has changed. The sleep aid one now has many fewer ingredients than when I bought it on its own in the past. When I purchased a single bottle, it smelled strongly and worked well. The version in this set has fewer ingredients and is weak.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToLearn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money I suppose, but not 100% like they claim.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, but when they came, one of the oils had leaked all over the others and the box...so I am already a half of a bottle low in the deep muscle relief, which sucks for me. It also would have been nice to have a recipe book, or something along those lines to see what oils can and can't go together, but no such luck. I also agree with others that these are not PURE as they claim...they are too liquidy to not be diluted with something else. I have other oils, and these drop out way too fast to be 100% oil....more like a liquid than an oil.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilcoxen

customer_reviews.title: the oil is watered down. it leaves a film ...
customer_reviews.text: the oil is watered down. it leaves a film in my oil diffuser and one of the oils was open when I got it, leaked all over the box. I wouldn't get them.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Momma

customer_reviews.title: We love all of the scents.
customer_reviews.text: This was an incredibly good buy and I’m so happy to have discovered this brand. We’ve purchased sets like these and either not liked half of the blends or some of them come rancid. That’s not the case with these. Every blend was pleasant. Hard to choose a favorite. But since my toddler isn’t feeling well, thieves/healing has been running the most. I wish I would have got the bigger sampler, but just couldn’t afford that splurge right now. I have a feeling though, that it would have been worth it. Will definitely be investing in that in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Penn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT OILS
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these oils. They smell wonderful, they cleared my nose (Breathe Easy), and I feel they’re the best oils I ‘ve purchased. I was buying some gifts and saw these blends on sale and decided to purchase several packages of different blends. I was very impressed the oils had extensive testing and rigorous standards like ISO, GSM, and 9001 & were certified Kosher and FDA Registered.
customer_reviews.author: Nonymus

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Mix of Essentials Oils
customer_reviews.text: I really like these blends, with my favorite being the Breathe blend. I've been putting a few drops on a washcloth and keeping it next to my pillow at night. It helps clear up any stuffiness I have, and it smells great! I've also tried putting some on a cotton ball, which I put in a vent in my car. It makes a great air freshener! I also own a small number of basic essential oils, but these are really nice for me, as I don't need to own every oil used in the making of the blends. The packaging is nice, and these oils would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: OptOutside

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price are unmatched!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these oils for the first time and I was skeptical of the quality because of the great prices. I’m sorry glad I purchased them because the quality of the oils is right up there with the other company’s that charge triple the amount ! Most of the time the smells of oils that aren’t the big brands smell off and are unpleasant, but not this brand! I love this brand and will definitely always repurchase what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I've used the stress and good night oils in my diffuser and they work great
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used the stress and good night oils in my diffuser and they work great. They smell amazing and don't irritate my sinuses or give me headaches. I've slept better every night since using the good night. I use about 6 drops in 500ml and believe this will last me at least a month per vile. The only drawback is the drops come out fast or drip down the side if I try to slow the rate of liquid for a more precise number. Excellent price for the set, so the former is negligible.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina E.

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite is the head relief, I get frequent headaches and this helps so so so so much! I love them, at first I didn’t like the smells but once I had them in the diffusers they smell great. I want to buy more now
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: They were beautifully packaged and labeled and there was no leaking at ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on the fragrance or effectiveness of these oils just yet because they are part of a Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law. However, because of some of the reviews on leaking bottles, I did open them up to make sure that they weren't broken or leaking. They were beautifully packaged and labeled and there was no leaking at all. I have always wanted to try these blended oils so I am getting ready to place another order for myself. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: MommaZ

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love this brand. My step mother sells YL Oils and I don't want to spend that much money on oils. I tried this affordable set, and was satisfied. Good Sleep was by far my favorite and I actually already ordered a new bottle along with Healing Solutions' Lavender bottle. I enjoy diffusing oils during the night so it's nice to have a variety to choose from whether I have a headache, feel achy, or feeling stressed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very nice essential oil selection
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is lovely. Unlike others that kind of “throw” the bottles in a box, the Cliganic oils are nicely placed in specially fitted spaces within the packaging box. The scents are exactly what they should be. I can’t speak to the extended longevity, but for my diffuser, the fragrance lasts for 8-10 hours. I would purchase again and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: I *heart* shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Great oil blends
customer_reviews.text: They all smell really good! The nighttime one is my favorite, I use it during the day because I love the smell of lavender! Strong smells, I only use 5 drops in my diffuser and it fills most of my house up with its lovely smell! I’ve had other oils that clogged up my diffuser because they were obviously cut with carrier oils but not these ones! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healing Solutions Essential Oils A+
customer_reviews.text: Like this product, so I don’t have to mix my own. I use in my diffuser! The blends were exactly what I needed. Good Sleep = great night of sleep when I used to wake every few hours. Deep Muscle has eased my pain in legs and back Stress Relief definitely eases stress Health Shield cleared my cold out and am feeling great since Breathe Blend keeps sinuses clear instead of plugged up Head Relief has worked wonders with my migraine occurrences.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Welch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this packaging and paid for one totally empty ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this and the whole big amazon box smelled of oils, I thought wow this must be so pure that the scent radiates through all the other items. But I opened one of the oils today and found that the bottle is broken and there was no oil left on the bottle, not even a drop. It was the deep muscle relief oil. I just received this item and havent opened any of it until today. Disappointed with this packaging and paid for one totally empty bottle! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bottles of Essential Oil )-:
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a gift for my significant other. Quality oils without question. However, some of the essential oil bottles were broken, and essential oils were spilled all throughout one of the boxes and onto the other bottles. The spilled oils from the broken bottles tarnished the other bottles' labels and made everything smell too pungent. Half the bottles were almost empty because of all the spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Uh oh leakage = very strong overwhelming scents
customer_reviews.text: The essential oils were very strong and I immediately got a headache. It might be because most of them leaked in the box and all the smells seemed to combine. The box was soaked and oily/greasy so that’s probably why they were so strong. I’m sure if they were packaged right then each scent wouldn’t be as strong but the combination of all of them together was very over whelming. Not sure if this has happened before. I think something just went wrong in the shipping department. I am sure other customers will have much better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Singmetosleep

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived open and covered in oils. It was obvious that the bottles had spilled in the box even though the tamper proof seals were not broken. On top of that they barely had any fragrance at all. Don't buy this obvious bait and switch like other products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Elwell

customer_reviews.title: Smell so good and so nice to use
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought a set of oils - I just liked these. I just drip into a candle or actually on the sleeve of my jammies or on a cloth - don't feel like cleaning out any more fountains, humidifiers, misters, etc. and the spectacular mildew that can happen if you don't. Really liked the scents and ordered another set already. Should last a while as I just use a few drops here and there at a time.
customer_reviews.author: JourneyOn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Product came with glass part of lid broken. There is no scent at all I put my oils in a diffuser never had a problem. Even if you put your nose up to the you bottle you barely smell anything. Worst purchase bought through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Zito

customer_reviews.title: Was leaking when shipped.
customer_reviews.text: All the bottles were slightly open upon arrival and all the scents are forever mixed together. I have no idea if the original scents are ok.
customer_reviews.author: l.h.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky mess
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for a gift. Box arrived damaged on edges, would be still ok, but when I open it to check, the oils leaked out. Box is soaked. Some bottles are half full. Can’t gift it, party is today don’t have time to make replacement claim. I Checked all bottles why they leaked, looks like some caps were loose or not tighten very tight, seals are not broken. I guess just take a risk if want to buy liquid products online. Messy arrival but Smells good. Disappointed in packaging, would be a great gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Wiesiek

customer_reviews.title: Good product but beware of broken glass from mishandling
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles had a big piece of glass chipped off. I guess due to mishandling but it wasn't so bad as to cause the bottle to leak. First time trying these "pre-mixed" oils. The oils don't seem watered down with a carrier agent. The Stress Relief is my favorite by far. Deep Muscle smells like pure camphor, way, way, too strong. All in all I'm pleased with the product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha-Wolf Tactical

customer_reviews.title: NO WAY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to essential oils, but I'm pretty sure I should be able to recognize familiar scents like lavendar, orange, and peppermint in blends. The lemon oil was just okay, but the others smell nothing like what their contents are supposed to be, and are in fact so awful that I can't wait to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Creepy
customer_reviews.text: Apart from Good Night blend, these are the worst oils I've used. They are so thin and they all give off this unnaturally medicinal smell when diffused, like you've just entered a hospital. EDIT 2016.03.24: Healing Solutions called me at work about my review and offered to send me a free set. I quickly told them I'm not interested before the conversation started. Many Amazon sellers "buy" ratings with free offers and refunds (something Amazon stubbornly refuses to do anything about), but this is the first time I got a call. The harassment from these sellers is getting out of control. Do not buy from this seller and consider not buying from Amazon in general.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: People aren't lying with these reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This really is such a good set of essential oils, love mixing it up each day and night with their blends, the smells and vibes are great! Worth the price I'd say, although my last purchase, one did come broken (likely not the fault of vendor, but mail). It happened to be my favorite scent too, but oh well, stuff happens. Highly recommend these though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stinky not pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like even one scent in this package. I use a lot of scented oils? but not even one from this package was pleasant even. maybe they had gone bad? I don't know but I will never use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I received 1 head ease, 1 breathe blend, 2 stress relief, and 2 goodnight blend. I did not receive the health shield, or deep muscle blend. I am very unhappy. The company promptly contacted me and sent the missing blends to me at no charge. They arrived yesterday and I'm very happy. Especially with the Health shield. When i opened it i wasnt sure about the smell. But I have it in my diffuser right now and it smells wonderful. The goodnight blend smells really awful though. I'll try it in the diffuser and see if it changes any. Over all I will be trying different blends in the future
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Essential oils
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality and smell amazing . I was a loyal young living fan but my budget prohibited me from always getting that brand. I actually blend them at night and also use them in cleaning solutions. During a bout of office germs I used the Health shield + stress relief and not only got compliments but it really uplifted my workday. They are great alone or blended. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - awful scents
customer_reviews.text: After using a well-known brand for my Essential Oil sourcing for years, I decided to take the chance on a cheaper product and REGRET my decision to buy this product! All of the oils have an awful scent! Not good at all. I will go back to spending a little extra money to get a quality product from now on with my essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Returns aren't free, unpleasant scents
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had realized before purchasing that returns are not free. I would like to return these but shipping is $6+. Only one of these bottles doesn't have a minty smell and I dislike that one the least but don't enjoy any of these oils. They all smell similar and none smell earthy and relaxing like I was hoping for. Guess I'll have to bite the bullet and return for 2/3 of my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: They do help
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the scents but that's what I get for blindly buying stuff online I cant smell first lol. But all in all they do work they do help with heachaches and breathing I'll give it that. And I've been mixing the muscle one with lotion for when my husband and i do back rubs, maybe we're crazy but we think its been helping relax our muscles more.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for First Time Users
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. I purchased this set after attending my first Young Living party and realizing I couldn't afford to pay $20 per body for those oils even though I fell in love with the product. I'm no expert, however I couldn't tell a difference between these oils and the name brand when using them in a diffuser. I haven't tried them in any other form yet but I haven't been disappointed with how they work in the diffuser. If you're curious about essential oils but don't want to pay an arm and a leg before your certain if they're right for you, then give this set a try!
customer_reviews.author: jnikburn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in the scent of these oils. I am not a particular or picky person at all, but these really are not refreshing. It says on the bottle the oils are pure but if that was the case they should smell much better. Have to give these away or something because I took the cap off each one to sniff and just went from barely tolerable to not pleasureful at all.
customer_reviews.author: James Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice oils
customer_reviews.text: I like a couple of the scents, and I realize it's not all about how it smells but the effect it has. The stress relief smells strong of orange oil and I'm not a huge fan of the smell but it is very relaxing. Good night smells great and is very calming helps me get comfortable and fall asleep and stay asleep. I've added the deep muscle to some coconut oil and arnica cream and feels wonderful on sore muscles and I love the wintergreen smell. The others seem to work well for their purpose. They just don't seem very strong I have to add more drops to my diffuser more often as opposed to other oils I've used.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Still deciding
customer_reviews.text: Great little value, but still not sure. I’m used to Young Living, but their prices can be high, so I thought I’d try this. It says 100% pure. I’m finding it difficult to find information on quality that doesn’t seem sponsored one way or they other. I don’t like the stress away blend as much as I do YL’s, but it goes great in the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: These oils are better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These oils come at a reasonable price so I didn't expect a lot, but I was happily surprised. The oils have a strong clean fragrance and work in the diffuser very well. I have compared it to one of the more well known brand names, and in my opinion, it actually performed better. We had a small shipping problem with the first order, but this company is a rockstar in customer service. They were prompt to respond and remedy the situation in a way that was even better than I had hoped. We will definitely buy this product and others from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J

customer_reviews.title: strong smell
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are pretty. I predominately bought them for the stress relief and breath right, but do not like the smell of either of them. So they kind of defeat the purpose...
customer_reviews.author: Michele W

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best smells. Do not seem to be pure oils. I added some real oils I had already to strengthen the smell, but I don't feel there would e been much therapeutic purpose. Arrived on time and packaged well. As described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazed.bygrace

customer_reviews.title: Great scents!
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried two scents so far, Breathe and Goodnight, they smell really good. Most essential oils smell pretty bad to me, but these have a pleasant scent. Also, most bedtime smells have lavender in them and I absolute hate lavender. Goodnight had a tiny bit of a lavender scent, but not so much to be over powering. I use them with an oil diffuser at night and during the day. Just a couple of drops lasts a few hours until the diffuser shuts off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: L. Titus

customer_reviews.title: What's Not To Like?!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product! Thrilled with the quality. They absorb quickly (I use them straight of the bottle; however, they can be diluted if one chooses) They’re not weird, funky or goopy--plus they smell amazing and leave one’s skin soft. The label clearly states the oils used, so one knows what one is getting before using. I’ve purchased doTerra. They’re great, but pricey. These are a better deal with no long-term commitment or auto ship. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sac Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: The smell blends are great. Helped my aching muscles right away helped me sleep. I'm ordering a set now as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Liken

customer_reviews.title: and these are just horrible. Plus
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but all of these oils have a very unpleasant odor. I've been using oils for a long time, and these are just horrible. Plus, they were leaking when I got them. I was refunded, but just FYI....they stink.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Good...but I bet there’s better
customer_reviews.text: They have a strong smell, my husband said a little on the medicinal side. But over all I like them. I use the NightTime one at night in a tiny 150ml diffuser, and while 2-3 drops are good, 4 drops are way to overwhelming. I’m new too oils, and I don’t believe in any of the actual medicinal magic that others talk about. I just think nice smelling things are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived, the Deep Muscle Relief bottle had leaked all over the rest of the bottles, and they all smelled like Icy Hot. The Stress Relief Blend smells mostly of bergamot and orange. The most notable scent in the Health Shield is clove. Good Night Blend smells most of lavender and ylang ylang. Breathe Blend smells like peppermint and eucalyptus. And, the Head Ease Blend smells most strongly of lavender and mint. The Good Night Blend and Stress Relief Blend smell the best. I'm really not a fan of the other four. But, scent and taste are probably the most subjective of senses. But, that's my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set purposely because of the good sleep one and that was missing from the set! I got two breathe scents instead. I dont want to go through the hassle of returning so I'm just dealing with it but I'm disappointed I didn't get what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great blend of aromas
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this brand is of a good quality compared to the now bloated world of essential oils. This particular batch of blends are a good assortment for anyone starting out with essential oils and aromatherapy. This brand delivers a product that is on par with the rest of the industry and appear to hold to a high standard. having said that, please be careful with how you use essential oils and follow proper precautions and sense.
customer_reviews.author: JB80

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid user of essential oils and this set looked to be perfect! There are many scents that I love in this large set; however, there are some scents that are very faint and do not fill the room with their aroma if being defused and I found that slightly disappointing. I do use those scents in necklaces; however, and that seems to work okay. Overall, this is a pretty good set of oils.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C. Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of essential oils! They all have their own unique fragrance and uses. The Deep Muscle Relief even worked on the gout in my toe! And usually nothing ever helps my gout! I love the fragrance of the Good Night blend in my diffuser at night, and the Headease has shooed away a headache or two! So far so good! I even used the Stress blend in my diffuser necklace for a stress free day! I'm loving this set! Love. Healing Solutions products!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy and Keith

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for a Good brand
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised.. love the good sleep and the headache away. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff jones

customer_reviews.title: Horrible scents
customer_reviews.text: One bottle arrived half empty since it was open. Tried the Sleep and Headache, had to immediately dump out and wash my unit to get rid of the horrible smell. Of the 6 scents only kept 2 that might be passable. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: harleychick3cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Essential Oils
customer_reviews.text: This great box of essential oils covers practically everything you use essential oils for - healing! No, they're not magic potions, but they help with what promise on their labels. Stress Relief, Muscle Relief and Good Sleep help mind and body relax, Head Relief and Breathe are great for cold, flu and sinus relief and Health Shield helps the body's immunity and all around health. The oils come in a nice sized 10ml bottle and is less than $20.00. Great product, great bargain. I'll buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Bevel-Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Leaked-Broken seal
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the variety but in came with a broken seal on one scent and leaked in packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well the shipping and stuff was good. But when I got the box I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Well the shipping and stuff was good. But when I got the box I could smell the oils through it. I knew that wasn’t a good sign. Opened them up and a few had leak marks on the side. This morning, first time using the oil, open one up and it broke in my hand. Also there was no oil in it. I was going to put the oil in a different container but there was no oil. I have not looked at the other yet. But unfortunately I am going to return them. I am bummed I was excited for them.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Sowles

customer_reviews.title: Scent blends are "ok"
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make diy bath bombs at home. Quite a few blogs raved about this specific set of blends of essential oils. I'm not a huge fan of most of the blends for a relaxing bath. Will try in my diffuser but wouldn't buy again personally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble getting use to my CPAP machine. Someone suggested that I try oils with it. I put oil on the disk and set it in front of the filter. Now I don't focus on the mask but the the wonderful smell coming through.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great selection for testing different oils.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the assorted set because this was my first experience with essential oils. I like some more than others. But the price was what sold me on the set. I can experiment with all of them and then purchase the ones I like best separately. Stress Relief is my favorite scent and probably what I need to most, so yay!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I did not like any of the essential oils. The smell was like alcohol and.was not refreshing, distressing or enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hammond

customer_reviews.title: My experience with these oil blends
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these oils for me as a Christmas present. I like how each oil says what oils are used in it. There were about 6 oils that I liked and were good blends,but the rest smelled too strong or were weird blends that I never use. It would have been nice to have some milder blends with less cedarwood used. It says if you are not completely satisfied with the experience you can get a refund. I still would choose a different brand over these.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

product_meta.title: Best Blends Set of 6 100% Pure, Best Therapeutic Grade Essential Oil - 6/10mL (Breathe, Good Sleep, Head Relief, Muscle Relief, Stress Relief, and Health Shield)
feature_bullets: The Best Blends Top 6 contains the following therapeutic essential oils: Breathe, Good Sleep, Head Relief, Muscle Relief, Stress Relief, and Health Shield - Consists of Various Oil Blends Including Lavender, Peppermint, Bergamot, Patchouli, Ylang Ylang, Orange, Tea Tree, Lemon and Four Others.
The most UNIQUE and AMAZING SMELLING essential oils on the market, in our opinion. If you are not ABSOLUTELY amazed, receive a full refund from the manufacturer, Healing Solutions no questions asked!

SUPERIOR EXPERIENCE: If you are just trying our Healing Solutions Essential Oils for the first time and you do not switch to it permanently as your new favorite oil the manufacturer, Healing Solutions will refund your money, guaranteed.

PURE + RIGOROUS QUALITY TESTING & CONTROLS: Distillation facility is GMP, ISO 9001 and Kosher certified. Make sure ALL oils you buy have these qualifications * CHECK OUT OUR REVIEWS!! * In our opinion our oil is superior to organic and THE MOST RARE, BEST SMELLING, AND MOST THERAPEUTICALLY EFFECTIVE ESSENTIAL OILS
Healing Solutions is SUPERIOR because it offers over 170 different oils for blending/pairing

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
